# TextureResource.Dimensions3D

**Structure**

The dimensions of the 3D texture.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Dimensions3D
```

## Overview

This specifies the width, height, and depth of the 3D texture

## Creating the 3D dimensions

- **dimensions(width:height:depth:)**: Specifies the dimensions of the 3D texture.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: Specifies the dimensions of the 3D texture.
